name: Cybernetic Arm
description: Fire a Cybernetic Arm to pull the selected target to you, or you to the target. Deal **100%** damage on hit, and **strongly suspend** the target, and regenerate weapon charge by **300**. Can be used to access hard-to-reach areas, and stores up to **2** charges at a time. Regain **1** charge every **30** seconds.

advancement.star1: Produce an EM shield that reduces damage taken by **20%** for 7 seconds.
advancement.star4: Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
advancement.star5: Reduce final damage of targets hit by **30%** for **7** seconds.
